name: Achievement Lurker: Dad Jokes
description: Join Jordy, the #1 Dad on his quest to be the best dad in the land. Jordy the #1 Dad roams the vast landscape and meets interesting friends like Mihailovich & Sergej. Jordy the #1 Dad is fueled by pride and arousal, in his quest to learn all the Dad jokes in the world. Do you have what it takes to become the #1 Dad?
minimum_requirements: OS: 7 Processor: core 2 duo Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: onboard Storage: 1 GB available space Sound Card: onboard
